name: Pound Round
description:
Pound Round is a best 3 out of 5 arena game for two players.

Use quick rolls, double jumps, and a single punch to knock the enemy out!

REQUIRES 2 Players!

Controls (Only Supports Gamepads for gameplay):

(ESC) -- Exit Game

(F1) -- Toggle Fullscreen

(A) -- Jump or Double Jump

(X) -- Punch

(B) -- Dodge Roll

This game was made for the 21st GM48. All assets, except for sounds and music, were created during GM48.
